title: MerchantSku
description: This schema represents a merchant sku

merchant_SKU.description:
Your unique identifier for each product you sell on Jet

			#Valid Values

			Can't have duplicates on the same upload

category.description:
Select a Jet Category

			#Valid Values

			Must be a Jet Category

sub_category_level1.description:
Select a Level 1 Sub-Category

			#Valid Values

			Must be a valid sub-category given the Category selection

sub_category_level2.description:
Enter a Level 2 Sub-Category

			#Valid Values

			Must be a valid sub-category given the Level 1 Sub-Category selection

sub-_category_level3.description:
Enter a Level 3 Sub-Category

			#Valid Values

			Must be a valid sub-category given the Level 2 Sub-Category selection

product_title.description:
Short product description

			#Valid Values

			1 to 500 alphanumeric characters

jet_browse_node_id.description:
The uniqueID that defines where the product will be found in the Jet.com browse structure

			#Valid Values

			This must be a valid jet_browse_node_id

standard_product_code.description:
A standard, unique identifier for a product.  ISBN-10, ISBN-13, UPC, EAN and GTIN-14 are accepted.

			#Valid Values

			*If standard_product_code_type is'UPC' - must be 12 digits

			*If standard_product_code_type is 'ISBN-13' - must be 13 digits

			*If standard_product_code_type is 'ISBN-10' - must be 10 digits

			*If standard_product_code_type is 'EAN' - must be 13 digits

			*If standard_product_code_type is 'GTIN-14' - must be 14 digits

standard_product_code_type.description:
Indicate the type of standard_product_code that was used.

			#Valid Values

			*UPC

			*ISBN-13

			*ISBN-10

			*EAN

			*GTIN-14

ASIN.description: Amazon standard itdentification number for this merchant SKU if available

multipack_quantity.description: Number of items with the given standard_product_code that makes up your merchant sku

brand.description:
Brand of the merchant sku

			#Valid Values

			1 to 50 characters

manufacturer.description:
Manufacturer of the merchant sku

			#Valid Values

			1 to 50 characters

mfr_part_number.description:
Part number provided by the original manufacturer of the merchant sku

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 50 characters

product_description.description:
Long description of the merchant sku

			#Valid Values

			1 to 2000 characters

bullets.description:
merchant sku feature description

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters each

			#array limitation

			maximum 5 elements of the 'bullets' array

number_units_for_price_per_unit.description: For Price Per Unit calculations, the number of units included in the merchant sku. The unit of measure must be specified in order to indicate what is being measured by the unit-count.

type_of_unit_for_price_per_unit.description: The type_of_unit_for_price_per_unit attribute is a label for the number_units_for_price_per_unit. The price per unit can then be constructed by dividing the selling price by the number of units and appending the text "per unit value." For example, for a six-pack of soda, number_units_for_price_per_unit= 6, type_of_unit_for_price_per_unit= can, price per unit = price per can.

shipping_weight_pounds.description:
Weight of the merchant sku when in its shippable configuration

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

package_length_inches.description:
Length of the merchant sku when in its shippable configuration

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

package_width_inches.description:
Width of the merchant sku when in its shippable configuration

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

package_height_inches.description:
Height of the merchant sku when in its shippable configuration

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

display_length_inches.description:
Length of the merchant sku when in its fully assempled/usable condition

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

display_width_inches.description:
Width of the merchant sku when in its fully assempled/usable condition

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

display_height_inches.description:
Height of the merchant sku when in its fully assempled/usable condition

			#Valid Values

			A number with 2 decimals

prop_65.description: You must tell us if your product is subject to Proposition 65 rules and regulations.  Proposition 65 requires merchants to provide California consumers with special warnings for products that contain chemicals known to cause cancer, birth defects, or other reproductive harm, if those products expose consumers to such materials above certain threshold levels.  The default value for this is "False," so if you do not populate this column, we will assume your product is not subject to this rule.  Please view this Web site for more information: http://www.oehha.ca.gov/.

legal_disclaimer_description.description:
Any legal language required to be displayed with the product.

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters

enum: choking hazard contains a small ball
choking hazard is a small ball

cpsia_cautionary_statements.description:
Use this field to indicate if a cautionary statement relating to the choking hazards of children's toys and games applies to your product.  These cautionary statements are defined in Section 24 of the Federal Hazardous Substances Act and Section 105 of the Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act of 2008.  They must be displayed on the product packaging and in certain online and catalog advertisements.  You are responsible for determining if a cautionary statement applies to the product.  This can be verified by contacting the product manufacturer or checking the product packaging.   Cautionary statements that you select will be displayed on the product detail page.  If no cautionary statement applies to the product, select "no_warning_applicable".

			#Valid Values

			*choking hazard balloon

			*choking hazard contains a marble

			*choking hazard contains a small ball

			*choking hazard is a marble

			*choking hazard is a small ball

			*choking hazard small parts

			*no warning applicable

			#array limitation

			maximum 4 elements of the 'cpsia_cautionary_statements' array

country_of_origin.description:
The country that the item was manufactured in.

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 50 characters

safety_warning.description:
If applicable, use to supply any associated warnings for your product.

			#Valid Values

			maximum of 500 characters

start_selling_date.description:
If updating merchant sku that has qty=0  at all FCs, date that the inventory in this message should be available for sale on Jet.com.  

			#Logic

			You should only use this field if the quantity for the merchant sku is 0 at all merchant_fcs.

fulfillment_time.description:
Number of business days from receipt of an order for the given merchant sku until it will be shipped (only populate if it is different than your account default.

			#Valid values

			0 = ships the day the OrderMessage is received

			1 = ships one business day after the 'merchant_order' is received

			2= ships two business days after the 'merchant_order' is received

			N = ships N business days after the 'merchant_order' is received

msrp.description:
Manufacturer's suggested retail price or list price for the product.

			#Valid values

			A number with up to 18 digits allowed to the left of the decimal point and 2 digits to the right of the decimal point. Commas or currency symbols are not allowed.

map_price.description:
For MAP (Minimum Advertised Price) based pricing.  If you don't know what this term means, this function probably does not apply to you.

			#Valid values

			A number with up to 18 digits allowed to the left of the decimal point and 2 digits to the right of the decimal point. Commas or currency symbols are not allowed.

fc_quantity.description:
FC Name and the Quantity in each pipe delimited:  For example: EFC = 3 | CFC= 5

			*If FC Quantity is provided we will ignore Quantity

			FC names should be validated against the names of Merchant FCs set up by the given merchant

map_implementation.description:
The type of rules that need to be followed when displaying Jet savings on item that brings the item's effective price below MAP

			#Valid values

			*'type0'- A user is able to see sub MAP pricing for this item even if they are not logged in

			*'type1'- A user must be logged in to see the savings on this item and that saving may be represented as a lower than MAP price on this item
			
			*'type2'- A user must be logged in to see the savings and they need be shown as Jet savings with the price being dispayed as the MAP price
			
			*'type3' -A user will never see Jet savings assoicated with this item but if they are logged in and purchase other items savings may be allocated to those other items
			
			*'type4' -Never apply any savings associated with this item anywhere

product_tax_code.description: Jet's standard code for the tax properties of a given product.

no_return_fee_adjustment.description:
Overides the category level setting for this fee adjustment; this is the increase in commision you are willing to pay on this product if the customer waives their ability to return it.  

			If you want to increase the commission you are willing to pay from a base rate of 15% to 17%, then you should enter '0.02'

			#Valid values

			A number with up to 1 digit allowed to the left of the deimal point and 2 digits to the right of the decimal point.

exclude_from_fee_adjustments.description: This SKU will not be subject to any fee adjustment rules that are set up if this field is 'true'

ships_alone.description:
If this field is 'true', it indicates that this 'merchant SKU' will always ship on its own.    
			A separate 'merchant_order' will always be placed for this 'merchant_SKU', one consequence of this will be that this merchant_sku will never contriube to any basket size fee adjustments with any other merhcant_skus.

parent_or_child.description: Define if the SKU is the parent or child

parent_sku.description:
Leave blank for a 'parent' merchant SKU.
			*If 'parent_or_child' = parent, then 'parent' sku = 'merchant sku'

			For a 'child' merchant SKU enter the 'merchant SKU' that its 'parent'

relationship.description:
Define the type of relationship that exists between a given set of 'parent' and  'child' Merchant SKUs

			'Variation' - Merchant SKUs that are the same accept for varying around one or two 'refinements'
			'Accessory' - Merchant SKUs that specifically compliment or are compatible with another Merchant SKU

variation_refinements.description:
Different choices of one or two 'refinements' that otherwise identical merchant SKUs vary.  This will vary by Jet Node.
			
			*Refinements selection will be required even though they are typically optional.

service_level.description: If your delivery options are defined by ServiceLevel only then use this field

shipping_carrier.description:
A shipping carrier, including all that carrier's ShippngMethods e.g. UPS, FedEx, USPS.  Use this field if you want your change to apply to all ShippingMethods of a given carrier. 
			If your delivery options are defined by ShippingCarrier then use this field

shipping_method.description: A specific shipping method e.g. UPS Ground, UPS Next Day Air, FedEx Home. If your delivery options are defined by ShippingMethod  then use this field

override_type.description: The type of shipping override Additonal Charge or Exclusive Charge, note Exclusive could be used to lower shipping)

shipping_amount.description: $ Value or percentage increase (for additional charge only)

is_shipping_restricted.description: Indicates whether the SellerSKU can or cannot be shipped using the specified shipping service (shippingCarrier, shippingMethod or serviceLevel). A value of
means that the SKU cannot be shipped using the specified shipping service.

is_shipping_exclusive.description: Indicates that the SellerSKU can ONLY be shipped with specified shipping service (shippingCarrier, shippingMethod or serviceLevel). A value of 'true' means that the SKU can be shipped using ONLY the specified shipping service.

attribute_id.description: the node attribue id number that you get from Jet provided documentation that corresponds with the attribute you are passing

attribute_value.description: The value for the attribute. For example if the attribute is size you may pass 'large' or if the the attribute is weight you may pass '22'. For attributes like weight the unit will be passed in the next field

attribute_value_unit.description: If the attribute_value requires a unit then you pass the unit here.
